title: Jeffrey A. Burnfield 1956-2018
content: BRISTOLVILLE — Jeffrey Alan Burnfield, 62, of Bristolville, passed away Friday, May 18, 2018, at his home, after a brief illness.   He was born March 14, 1956, in Warren, a son of Kenneth and the late Eileen Burnfield.    On July, 30 1977, Jeff married his love, Carol Barnett.    He was a graduate of Champion High School, and was employed as a millwright at Vanex Tube for over 30 years.    Jeff was an outdoorsman, and also enjoyed spending time at his Lake Erie cottage.    Besides his wife, Jeff is survived by his brother, Mike (Diane) Burnfield of Farmdale; his sister, Carla Burnfield of Canton; stepsister, Elon Woodyard and three other step-siblings; along with two goddaughters, many nieces, nephews and great-nieces and great-nephews across the country and around the world.    A memorial service will take place at 10:30 a.m. Saturday, June 9, 2018, at Champion Presbyterian Church, where the Rev. Stephen Stelle will officiate.    Carl W. Hall Funeral Home is honored to assist with these arrangements.    (special notice)
